import './checkout.styles.scss' import {useContext} from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../../context/cart.context' const Checkout = () => { const {cartItems, addItemToCart, removeItemFromCart} = useContext(CartContext) return(
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map((cartItem)=>{ const {id, name, quantity} = cartItem return(

{name}

{quantity} removeItemFromCart(cartItem)}>decrement addItemToCart(cartItem)}>increment
) }) } Total: 0
) } export default Checkout
